message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1200000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1150000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the time we've already invested in this negotiation.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking $1050000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to make a serious offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your serious offer, Bob, but I'm still a bit below my target. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'll offer you a price of $1100000, which is $50000 above your last offer. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering the value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to get the best deal possible. I'm thinking $1000000 is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me. I'm hoping we can meet at this price point.

I understand that you're looking to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, which is $50000 above your last offer. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the time we've invested in this negotiation.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1050000, Alice, but I'm still a bit below that. I'm thinking $975000 is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price point.

I understand that you're still looking to negotiate, Bob, but I'm getting concerned that we're getting too far away from my target price. I'm willing to make one final compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum acceptable price. I'll offer you a price of $1025000, which is $25000 above your last offer. This is my final concession, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

Alice, I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $975000 and $1025000, which would be $950000. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price point.
